messages.400: We intercepted your malformed request before it caused more damage!
messages.401: We detected the unauthorized access attempt immediately!
messages.402: We identified that payment is required for this resource!
messages.403: We successfully blocked unauthorized access to protected areas!
messages.404: We thoroughly searched the entire neighborhood for that page!
messages.405: We identified the invalid method being used!
messages.406: We detected the format incompatibility right away!
messages.408: We monitored the request timeout and documented it!
messages.409: We identified the conflict between your request and the server!
messages.410: We confirmed the page is completely gone - no alien involvement!
messages.413: We stopped the oversized payload before it got through!
messages.429: We noticed you're sending too many requests and intervened!
messages.500: We identified a critical server malfunction!
messages.502: We detected the gateway failure immediately!
messages.503: We discovered the service is offline before you wasted time!
messages.504: We're monitoring the gateway timeout situation!
messages.default: We identified the threat and took immediate action!

descriptions.400: Watch member noticed suspicious syntax in request. Took defensive action with alien technology. Request neutralized. Syntax parser also neutralized.
descriptions.401: Watch patrol identified unauthorized individual. Applied alien security protocols. Individual blocked. All individuals now blocked. Security achieved.
descriptions.402: Team investigated payment anomaly at digital Costco. Payment processing terminated with extreme prejudice. All e-commerce now free. You're welcome.
descriptions.403: Watch responded to forbidden access attempt. Created additional forbidden zones. Everything is now forbidden. Including this error page.
descriptions.404: Extensive neighborhood search conducted for missing page. Search area expanded to entire server. Page still missing. Server also missing.
descriptions.405: Watch identified improper method usage. Confiscated all methods for evidence. Accidentally destroyed methods in evidence locker explosion.
descriptions.406: Format investigation revealed incompatibility. Applied universal alien format converter. Everything is now in alien language. Including our meeting notes.
descriptions.408: Watch waited for request to complete. Got bored. Blew up timeout mechanism. Time itself may be compromised in server vicinity.
descriptions.409: Conflict resolution team deployed. Used alien peace protocol. Both sides of conflict eliminated. Problem solved. Collateral damage: yes.
descriptions.410: Confirmed permanent deletion. Re-confirmed with alien scanner. Accidentally vaporized backup drives during scanning. It's super gone now.
descriptions.413: Large payload intercepted. Applied alien compression beam. Payload compressed beyond recognition. May have compressed surrounding data. And the server rack.
descriptions.429: Excessive requests detected. Initiated emergency shutdown protocols. Shut down requests. Shut down server. Shut down entire data center. Area now peaceful.
descriptions.500: Server malfunction discovered. Watch attempted repair with alien technology. Server now more malfunctioned. But different. Progress?
descriptions.502: Gateway issue identified. Gateway replaced with alien gateway. Alien gateway incompatible with Earth internet. Should have read manual first.
descriptions.503: Service offline detected. Watch secured area. Service remains offline. Also added laser perimeter. Service very secure. And very offline.
descriptions.504: Gateway timeout monitored. Watch fired warning shot at gateway. Gateway stopped timing out. Gateway stopped everything. Went too far?
descriptions.default: The Watch team responded to suspicious activity in your request. We did what we had to do. Sorry about your server.

footers.400: We meet at Costco every Tuesday. Sorry about your syntax.
footers.401: We're neighborhood watch. We watch EVERYTHING. Even your credentials.
footers.402: At least at Costco, the prices are always good. Unlike your payment status.
footers.403: We may have set the alien security too high. Can't remember how to lower it.
footers.404: We're not qualified for this. We just wanted to investigate a suspicious incident at Costco.
footers.405: We're just suburban dads who found an alien orb. This got out of hand.
footers.406: We should have left the alien technology alone. Hindsight is 20/20.
footers.408: We're impatient suburban dads. Waiting isn't our strong suit. Neither is alien tech.
footers.409: We solve neighborhood disputes. This got more explosive than usual.
footers.410: At least when we delete something, we're thorough. Like, REALLY thorough.
footers.413: The alien orb seemed like it would help. It did not help.
footers.429: We thought you were an alien invasion force. Our bad. Multiple requests = attack?
footers.500: We broke it. We fixed it. We broke it worse. We're not IT professionals.
footers.502: We replaced your gateway with alien technology. It seemed smart at the time.
footers.503: We secured the service. It's so secure it doesn't work anymore. Mission accomplished?
footers.504: Next time we'll be more patient. Probably. No promises.
footers.default: We're just suburban dads. We're not qualified for this.
